title: Tips on use
content:
There are a few basic rules you must follow to ensure you and others stay safe
and enjoy using the Girl Effect mobile website. If you break these rules you
may will receive a warning, temporary or permanent ban. The rules are: \-
Harassment and bullying of others will not be tolerated. \- Respect younger
users and do not use bad, rude or offensive language or suggest links to
obscene or offensive material. \- Do not give out your personal information.
Never tell people: \- your real name (make up a nickname), \- your age, \-
your address \- the name of your school, \- your email address or phone
number, or \- any financial information or passwords. \- Avoid meeting up with
people you meet online. But if you do meet up make sure that you have an
adult, or your parent or guardian, with you. If you are under 13 years old you
must not use this services unless you have permission from your parent or
guardian and you use the services under their supervision. The Girl Effect
mobile website is suitable for users 13 years of age and above.
